description: This file contains core business logic functions for handling bear data, including retrieving records and formatting timestamps for API responses, designed to be used both in Flask and AWS Lambda contexts.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] get_bear_records()
methods.description: Generates a list of bear data records with IDs, poses, and timestamps.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] format_bear_records_for_api(records: List[Dict[str, Any]], format_timestamps: bool = True)
methods.description: Formats bear records for API responses, converting timestamps to ISO 8601 strings if specified.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] get_bear_data_for_flask()
methods.description: Retrieves bear data formatted for Flask, with datetime objects.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] get_bear_data_for_lambda()
methods.description: Retrieves bear data formatted for Lambda, with ISO 8601 timestamp strings.

ctags.name: format_bear_records_for_api
ctags.pattern: /^def format_bear_records_for_api(records: List[Dict[str, Any]], format_timestamps: bool = True) -/
